attributes.review: I downloaded the app so I could be up to date about our great president, who has done his best to MAKE OUR NATIONS GREAT ✨🧚🏽‍♂️ However, this app has only led me to be disappointed 😔. It took SIX HOURS to download, and when I open it, it just calls me a clown 🤡. I can’t believe how rude this app is! It’s not worth your time, do not download it!!! I’m severely upset with the president, him telling us to drink detergent was a funny joke but this is just UNACCEPTABLE! 🙄
attributes.title: So disappointed 🥺

attributes.review: I got this app thinking it would make my smarter about my about my candidates but all I got was an ugly dumb looking Cheeto man on my phone and I was terrified by the site😰 and that is not even the worst part my little brother was screaming in a demonic voice saying trump is dump 💩and he is one one years of age, he was also levitating in the air and his eyes were all red do not get this app or your little brother might get possessed 👁👄👁
attributes.title: I am disgusting 🤮🐷👁👄👁🤡

attributes.review: I am very dissatisfied with this app. For starters, there were way too many notifications, roughly 69 a day. After a week of having it on my phone, my phone became very slow and laggy. On top of that, it shuts down every hour, forcing me to restart it up to 12 times a day. This is an hUGE problem. I blame it on fake news media and those gosh darn generation z kids. Also women of course they are the worst.
attributes.title: Enraged

attributes.review: This app makes terrible sandwiches!! I told my cow that I wanted a sandwich but he said he wouldn’t allow himself to make sandwiches for me anymore so I went to Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza to complain but when I got there the night guard wasn’t even there, only a Freddy suit!( awful work support!) And if my day wasn’t already bad my cow went back home to shoot a laser from the moon. And now I’m the only human being left, all thanks to this app!!!
attributes.title: WORSE APP EVER

attributes.review: This app makes me wanna step in a puddle with socks on. Makes me wanna listen to lil pump. I’d rather jump off a twenty foot building to belly flop on legos. Makes me wanna eat eggs with the shell on. As soon as I opened the app I lost half of my braincells, my whole house fell down, and my thumbs dislocated. It immediately made me like Arby’s sandwiches. After I downloaded it I  permanently now were no clothes in Antarctica like temp while in a freezer drinking cold milk and eat raw shrimp. Do not buy
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it ruined my life. I  had sudden dizzy spells, my head was always hurting and I have hot flashes. I get nightmares where a horse curb stomps a meerkat. After I downloaded this app my dodo bird died, as I was harboring the last one alive. Her name was Chichi and she’s been watching over my family for years now😔😔. My piranha ate my favorite wicker basket and my black mamba went into epileptic shock. Do not download this app!! It’s dangerous!!!
attributes.title: I hate this app with a passion

attributes.review: I couldn’t wait to download this app! I heard amazing things about it from all of the country folk at my racist school!🥰 as soon as I opened up the app, a wrinkly, ugly, old, orange ogre popped up on my screen. I already have PTSD from past traumas and now I can’t sleep at night! It’s been 4 nights in a row where this creature has popped up in my nightmares. Never again. Please save your eyes and dreams from this terrible incident and DO NOT DOWNLOAD. #savetiktok.
attributes.title: AWFUL

attributes.review: okay so i was scrolling through the app store and i found this. i downloaded it and for the signup process, it asked what my gender was. i stated that i am a woman, and IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE APP SHUT DOWN AND WOULD ONLY SHOW PICTURES OF DONALD TRUMP N4KED!!!! i was so disturbed at this horrifying images and very disturbed by the fact that his thing, was, in fact, very very tiny. now, whenever i open the app, it only shows me these images. not a great experience overall.
attributes.title: THE WORST APP IVE EVER USED !!!!

attributes.review: I originally downloaded trump’s app to get up updates and alerts during his campaign. However after it downloaded my phone started crashing and glitching. A complete waste of space and storage and even after it stopped crashing, the app it self didn’t even function correctly. Really disappointed Wanted to hear trump’s complete unbiased opinion on stuff 😔
attributes.title: Waisted use of space

attributes.review: DO NOT USE THIS APP FOR YOUR HEALTH AND SAFETY. i wanted to start dieting so i downloaded this app, as soon as i went on the diet that the app “curated” for me, i had a terrible case of diarrhea. also, come to find out, this “curated,” “personal to you” diet is the same for everyone. i asked my friends, and not only were they given the same diet, they all had diarrhea. some of them were even vomiting. DO NOT USE THIS FOR DIETING. nice interface though.
attributes.title: idk how to do it but the thumbs down emoji
